p: All authors have an academic interest and contributed equally. The authors TPV and LAN conducted the literature search, collected data, collated all information, and wrote the review. The authors CGM and PGK contributed to the study design and revised the review draft. TPV is a member of the Pan African Network for Rapid Research, Response, and Preparedness for Infectious Diseases Epidemics consortium (PANDORA-ID-NET RIA2016E-1609).
